item.title: UPS is a buy as inflation moderates, BMO Capital Markets says in upgrade
item.description: United Parcel Service could benefit from lower interest rates as inflation eases, according to BMO Capital Markets.

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades Norwegian Cruise Line, says stock is primed for a strong 2025
item.description: A strong year and outlook for the cruise industry has Goldman Sachs forecasting more gains for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings in 2025.

item.title: Alaska Airlines plans new nonstop flights to Japan, Korea in $1 billion postmerger profit push
item.description: Alaska Airlines is launching new flights and a new premium credit card to help grow profits by $1 billion in 2027.

item.title: Bernstein upgrades American Airlines, says stock can surge nearly 40%
item.description: Bernstein upgraded shares to outperform from market perform.

item.title: Women's basketball league Unrivaled signs uniform deal with Under Armour
item.description: Women's 3-on-3 basketball league Unrivaled has signed a new multiyear deal with Under Armour
